ComicInfo.Series: Young Hellboy: Assault on Castle Death
ComicInfo.Summary: Assault on Castle Death [Part Four]: Hellboy continues to believe he is helping Lobster Johnson fight evil while he inadvertently evades the killer pursuing him. The villain falls to his death and Hellboy's fever breaks, but there is no simple explanation of the night's events.
ComicInfo.Teams: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
ComicInfo.Title: Assault on Castle Death [Part Four]
